comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: There are a few candidates, this one seems the best shot: The New York Times, January 20, 1915, Wednesday, Page 9, 916 words. POSE IN TABLEAUX OF ARTIST'S DREAM; Society Girls in a Feature of Picture Ball at Astor for Stony Wold Sanatorium. A Miss Margaret Wolf is listed as a "classic dancer" in a play called "A Night in Bohemia"
